‚Ä¶ on the road. But then I stop here. Waisting my life with waiting an hour for a single shower while incompetent employees stand around chuckling with other employees. No urgency, no empathy for a truckers time, & no respect. Go flip burgers.

‚Ä¶ recently visited this location and had an incredibly unpleasant experience with the cashiers. While I was there at the counter, fellow driver was about to spend $20 on a shower. Since I had a free shower to offer, I kindly offered it to ‚Ä¶
Water pressure in shower was very low, a Dixie cup would have rinsed me faster.

‚Ä¶ this location. It's a truck stop that deserves five stars. Clean, nicely decorated, friendly team, very spacious and clean shower cabins. I have enormous pleasure to stay overnight here, take a shower or have a coffee. I read the ‚Ä¶

Went in for a shower because there is an issue with my load at Campbell. They seemed friendly up there, shower 4 was OK. Noticed washers and dryers are cash only, so no cards. Dident get food, but the fountain root beer tasted a bit off.

‚Ä¶ and sent me to Petro across the street(fixed the screw up in 5 min) all the techs ran away like little mice after my dash lighted up like a christmes tree!!! Stay away and the store had 3 guys working, waited on a shower for over an hour.
This loves store has big and clean shower i ever been visit staff is good and if you need shower you gonna like this place other thing parking lot is big you ll definitely get parking

showerReviews.reviewText: PSA: They no longer have PJ Fresh at this location. Super friendly staff. Water pressure in shower is amazing!! The showers were small but did the job. Clean parking lot and the store is clean as well.

I had really clean showers and met super nice, friendly employees! Was getting truck fixed next door at Petro and had to wait for parts delivery; but, used Pilot for my showers since i have Shower power.. I had a really good Tuna Subway $6 ‚Ä¶

Good job cleaning the toilet. I paid for a shower and this what I got.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower was fairly clean but the water would fluctuate from cold to warm. Never got hot. Shower #2. Very disappointing shower experience. Parking was good. At 8:30pm there were still a good amount of spots for a Wednesday. Friendly staff.

Shower ducked super hot then super cold, been driving all day hungry no restaurant. Had a chicken quick thingy looked like food was left out all day the fish was black they also had a quiznos stupid sub sandwich place all I want is a good ‚Ä¶

Its normal after fueling 150 gallons to get a cr√©√© shower......but if you forget your pin # from your ultra one card ......they d ont care ! Specially the fuel counter Girl by sunday pm may 19'24'she Tell me to use kiosk r√©demption for ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ with a corporate card you WILL NOT get your discount here (private owned petro), you may or may not be able to get a shower but don‚Äôt count on it‚Ä¶.I‚Äôll be surprised if it doesn‚Äôt close its doors within a year. This IS NOT  what petro is‚Ä¶.

Cashier more interested in socializing. Locals coming to use washer and dryers. None left for drivers. Shower was changing temperatures every 2 minutes.
Not impressed with this Petro.
1 good thing. It has a dog run.

I usually stop here at least once a week.  This was my second visit this week and I stopped for a shower.  I walked into the room and had a fly buzzing around.  Got ready to shave another fly.  By the time I was done shaving and showering I ‚Ä¶
The worst showers that I have ever heard seeing that petrol has the lowest water pressure I've ever encountered. If you want to shower find someplace else if you want good water pressure
Shower was way to small even for one person. No decent food. Good parking though
Nice place friendly service clean restroom and shower good food road service
Shower are very small other than nice safe place to rest and eat.

showerReviews.reviewText: I want to thank the cashier, Kat, for her patience and perseverance, she put all her effort and knowledge into finding my shower points. I am extremely grateful to her for her help! Thank you

The showers are totally disgusting. Something I would expect at a flip-flops truckstop. I almost did not take the shower, but I‚Äôve been running hard and I‚Äôm due for one. The men‚Äôs bathroom smells like urine ammonia. The ladies in the Taco ‚Ä¶
What was suppose to be a 30 minute break shower, turns into well over an hour. Nobodies in the showers. But nobodies cleaning them. I‚Äôm so done with TA.

I bought a shower at that location and weighted 4 an hour and the employee was taking a lunch break for 30 minutes and people wanna take a shower anyways, so they can relax. Take a break from driving.
Customers always comes first

‚Ä¶ this is the perfect spot to spend the night. The parking lot is huge and everybody  place was great I've always loved truck stops of America there's a shower amenity is awesome and the stories well cap with plenty of items to choose from.

The staff was friendly, the place is clean and the shower felt wonderful. It has a Taco Bell inside and they did a wonderful job with our food. There is also lots of parking for overnight trucks.

Repair shop sucks though.
I am waiting for the shower 1our .just leave 2min is missing. I want to change new ticket...She says NO.what hell!

Plenty of parking and the facility is decent, but the showers really need some work. I'm afraid to step foot in there without some thick shower shoes. Too much mold and soap scum from improper or no cleaning. Some showers have a really bad ‚Ä¶
Paid for shower as the app said there was no wait. Got inside and no clean showers and worker was sitting on his phone. Water also scalding hot.

Stop here often to fuel, shower and eat.   I confess to being a Taco Bell addict.  And I just discovered the work -around for the old Grilled Stuft burrito,  which for some reason they took off the menu.   Thanks TB for taking off your most ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Very nice place, nice showers, clean bathroom and nice stuff. Thank God for the state of Ohio and it's citizens. It is the only state i known which has free showers at it's plaza for truck drivers.
Great! Clean. Friendly atmosphere! Food. Handicap restrooms too!
Very nice, clean place to stop when you're traveling

Nice clean facilities. Lots of parking. Could use parking enforcement since drivers would rather block the parking stalls near the building parking behind the truck, than to go two or three rows in where the rows are completely empty. More an issue of lazy truckers who should not be on the road than an issue with the facility.

Every single rest area on the Ohio Turnpike is a tremendous resource for travelers of all shapes and sizes. For truckers, they have showers that are great. For travelers they have all kinds of resources, too. The parking lots are huge and ‚Ä¶

Great area for truck drivers.
plenty of parking and spacious clean and well lit at night.
The building inside has rest rooms, showers and a lil area with chairs and tv if ‚Ä¶

Stopped here on my way to VA. This is a part of our regular route when we come this way and it is always clean and quiet. I am always pleased with the cleanliness of the women's restroom. Not much here, but no complaints on my end!
looked to be nice, checked over the showers seemed nice. close to 7 am and none of the places in the food court were open so we got no breakfast.
